thread.title: Navratri 2015, Outfit of the Day 9 and 10: Look stunning in Sky Blue with these style tips
thread.title_full: Navratri 2015, Outfit of the Day 9 and 10: Look stunning in Sky Blue with these style tips

author: Maggie Davis
title: Navratri 2015, Outfit of the Day 9 and 10: Look stunning in Sky Blue with these style tips
text:
Navratri 2015, Outfit of the Day 9 and 10: Look stunning in Sky Blue with these style tips By Maggie Davis on October 21, 2015 at 3:08 AM Comments The season of colours, dance and masti is coming to an end. Everyone would be in a dilemma of what to wear and look impressive for the night where the colour code is sky blue. These outfit ideas will surely glam up your evening. Let’s not forget that the sky blue colour may differ with the type of material you opt for. Here we bring to you some simple and glamorous dressing ideas so that you look ravishing on the last day of garba night. Outfit Idea #1 As it’s the final day, let’s not become fussy to put up the best dress. Outfits that have some pearl work will be the best. Saree with a combination of lace and sequins could work well. Even the footwear shouldn’t be ignored. Some mix and match would do wonders for the last night of Navratri. Jewellery’s are ladies’ best friend – so don’t miss to don that too. (ALSO READ: Navratri 2015, Outfit of the Day 8: Look stunning in Pink with these styling tips) Outfit Idea #2 The men could opt for simple or pathani kurta with a pair of dhoti or pants (as per comfort). Some contrast in the attire will make you look different. Keep the bottom simple and the top could be with little embroidery work. You could even go for a short kurta. Choice is all yours! (ALSO READ: Navratri 2015, Outfit of the Day 7: Ways to look fabulous in White) Hope you liked the outfit ideas that we presented to you on all the nine days of this festive season. Rock the garba night tonight in your best attire! (Image Credits – Pinterest)
